68048.オンラインの世界では 多くの人が\nあなたのキャラや 兄弟（姉妹）キャラの名前を:
In this online world, people will be able to see the name of your character and your sibling.
Please don't use any names that infringe any copyrights, reveal private information, or make others feel uncomfortable.
Clarity Note: Please also refrain from using a character name like, but not limited to, the following:
- Names of random characters. - Names of the same repeated character. These names are common among bot/RMT accounts.
If you've created a character with such a name, it's strongly recommended to go back and change to a more appropriate name.
If you need help, the various English-speaking communities have members that are more than happy to assist with naming.
There are <%dNUM> other players also using the name "<%sPCNAME>".
